The 2048 game is a simple yet brain-teasting puzzle that revolves around combining tiles on a grid.

games.description: An addictive and fun two player game where you try and score as many baskets as you can against your friends!

games.description: Play soccer with big heads of 13 world-class teams in this fun and funny game. Choose your favorite club and compete in to score the most goals.

games.description: Flappy Bird is a simple yet challenging game where you control a bird and try to navigate through pipes without hitting them.

games.name: toss_the_turtle
games.description: Toss the Turtle is a fun and addictive game where you launch a turtle as far as you can using cannons, bombs, and jetpacks.

games.name: stickman_hook
games.description: Swing through the levels and try not to fall in this fun and challenging game.

games.name: knife_hit
games.description: Throw knives at spinning targets, try to hit the fruit without hitting the other knives.

games.name: emulator
games.description: Run any ROM in the ROM library, with custom contrls, quick saves, and more.

games.name: learn_to_fly_1

games.name: learn_to_fly_3

games.name: duck_life_4
games.description: Train your duck in various activities and compete in tournaments in this engaging training simulation game.

games.name: bloxorz
games.description: Bloxorz is a classic puzzle game where you try to move a block to a hole by rolling it through a series of platforms.

games.name: dinosuar_game
games.description: A clone of the Chrome Dinosuar game. Load this page and then bookmark it. If your intenet ever goes away, this game will still work.

games.name: iron_snout
games.description: Punch, kick, and flip your way through an endless horde of wolves. Dodge axes and throw them right back to the wolves to show them who is boss.

games.name: slow_roads
games.description: Endless driving zen.

games.description: Gladihoppers is a physics-based fighting game where you control a gladiator and try to defeat your opponents in the arena.

games.name: drive_mad
games.description: Drive silly cars at high speeds in dangerous terrain. Oh, and you can't steer. Good luck!

games.name: papas_tacomia
games.description: Run a taco restaurant and serve delicious dishes to customers in this fun cooking game.

games.name: riddle_school
games.description: Escape the school in this classic point-and-click adventure game.

games.name: riddle_school_2
games.description: Continue the adventure and escape the school once again in this sequel.

games.name: riddle_school_3
games.description: The third installment of the Riddle School series, with more puzzles and challenges.

games.name: riddle_school_4
games.description: The next sequel in the Riddle School series, try to bust out of the school once again.

games.name: riddle_school_5
games.description: The fifth and last installment of the Riddle School series, with a much longer playthrough and more puzzles.

games.name: learn_to_fly_idle
games.description: An idle game based on the popular Learn to Fly series, where you use your cannon to launch snowballs and earn money to upgrade.

games.name: skidoo_tt

games.name: cyber_puck

games.name: soccer_random
games.description: Another game by twoplayergames, try to score as many goals as you can against your friends or the computer.

games.name: tic_tac_toe
games.description: Tic tac toe.

games.name: nighttime_visitor
games.description: You're working late at the office tonight....
